About Me

Business Analyst - Software Engineering at LTI, India, (September 2017 - July 2019)
Business Data Analyst Intern at QliqSOFT Inc., Dallas, Texas, United States of America (June 2020 - Present)

BIO

Graduate Student pursuing MS in IT and Management at the University of Texas at Dallas, graduating in May 2021

30+ months experience working as a Business/Data Analyst in the US and India

Detail oriented and Data Driven individual with profound knowledge on various Front-end, Data Visualization and Analysis tools and Project Management softwares

I am proficient in Data & Business Analytics, Front-end Development and aspire to advance my career in the same

Larsen & Toubro Infotech (LTI), India

Business Analyst, September 2017 - July 2019

Interfaced with clients to maintain Enterprise Level Application Information using Enterprise Architecture.(Agile)

Built dashboards using Tableau to determine KPIs for people opting to extend their insurance term

Developed UML for 50+ Enterprise Applications which helped visualize a software Architecture

Worked on requirement gathering and understanding the flow of website with clients

Captured enterprise data for 1000+ applications as backup, in case of a system failure

Managed Product Backlog items and prioritized items to be delivered during backlog refinement

Implemented an automation Excel tool which improved efficiency by 80% using C# and ASP.NET MVC5

QliqSOFT Inc., Dallas, TX

Business Data Analyst Intern, June 2020 - Present

Implemented agile methodology through scrum framework to manage web development effort

Analyzed 3000+ patient-bot JSON conversation in Excel using Data Mining principles to filter patient’s preference for taking a COVID-19 vaccine

Implemented Patient Virtual Visits dashboard which showcased 50K + of patients’ visits information using Power BI and DAX Queries

Analyzed 20,000+ patient-bot NoSQL JSON conversation to find out the reason for Video Call failures

Managed 200+ User Stories tickets on JIRA and tracked the progress of each JIRA ticket

Performed UAT to make sure specifications of User Stories are completed, before closing JIRA tickets
